GDevelop is an open-source game creator,: „GDevelop“ yra atvirojo kodo žaidimų kūrėjas, pritaikytas greitai ir intuityviai kurti žaidimus.
Publish your web game on Poki: Publish your web game on Poki
who added features, fixed bugs, sent new: kurie pridėjo funkcijų, ištaisė klaidas, atsiuntė naujų pavyzdžių, sukūrė pamokų ir padėjo bendruomenei.
BUB is a very special, one of a kind cri: BUB yra ypatingas kritikas. Tiksliau, ji yra [pati nuostabiausia katė planetoje] (http://lilbub.com) ... ir jos žaidimas sukurtas naudojant „GDevelop“!
The game is a retro 8-bit game, with bea: Tai yra retro 8 bitų žaidimas, turintis gražų meną ir garso takelį, kuris pakaitomis keičiasi tarp platformingų lygių, su paslėptomis paslaptimis, ir šaudyklių lygiais su viršininkais, keliais priešais ir premijomis.
Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-comb: „Hyperspace Dogfights“ yra reaktyvinės kovos žaidimas, kuriame jūs sprogdinsite, vengsite ir pjaustysite savo kelią per technologiškai žemesnių priešų mases.
As your intergalactic intervention missi: Vykdant jūsų tarpgalaktinę intervencijos misiją, jūsų adaptyvusis hiper-reaktyvinis įrenginys taps kažkuo stipresnis ir keistesnis, surinkdamas kelis šimtus žaidime esančių daiktų.
Imagine and publish your games with GDev: Įsivaizduokite ir paskelbkite savo žaidimus naudodami „GDevelop“. Komplektuota su pamokomis ir pavyzdžiais.
Add ads to your game with AdMob: Pridėkite reklamas į savo žaidimą naudodami „AdMob“
Use AdMob in your GDevelop games to disp: Naudokite „AdMob“ savo „GDevelop“ žaidimuose norėdami rodyti reklamas ir apdovanoti žaidėjus
Go to [AdMob website](https://www.google: Go to [AdMob website](https://www.google.com/admob/) and create an account. Then, create a new app from the AdMob interface and an ad unit. Note the identifiers for both the app and the ad unit, as they will be used in your game.
In GDevelop, open the properties of your: In GDevelop, open the properties of your game and paste the AdMob **app id**. This acts as the identification that allows AdMob to serve ads in your app.
Add events in your game to load and show: Add events in your game to load and show the ad when needed (this can be when a level is successfully completed for example). Paste the ad unit identifier into the parameters of the action. You can also enter "test" for loading a test ad.
You can test and publish your game on An: Galite išbandyti ir paskelbti žaidimą „Android“ tiesiogiai iš „GDevelop“. Redaktoriuje atidarykite savo žaidimą, tada langą Eksportuoti. Pasirinkite „Android“, spustelėkite eksportuoti ir palaukite kelias minutes.
The blog of the GDevelop team, contribut: The blog of the GDevelop team, contributors and community.
Contribute to GDevelop - Open-source HTM: Prisidėkite prie GDevelop - Atviro kodo HTML5 žaidimų kūrimo programa/įrankis
GDevelop is an open-source project (even: „GDevelop“ yra atvirojo kodo projektas (net ši svetainė): kiekvienas gali prisidėti ir patobulinti programinę įrangą!
There are multiple ways you can contribu: Yra keli būdai, kuriais galite prisidėti prie „GDevelop“, priklausomai nuo jūsų laiko, įgūdžių ir to, kas jus domina.
GDevelop and the website can be translat: „GDevelop“ ir svetainę galima išversti į jūsų kalbą! Vertimai atliekami svetainėje, kurioje gali dalyvauti visi.
It's easy to get the source code of GDev: Nesunku gauti „GDevelop“ šaltinio kodą ir pradėti tobulinti dalykus!
The forum and the Discord chat are the p: Forumas ir „Discord“ pokalbiai yra vieta, kur galima gauti ir suteikti pagalbą kitiems „GDevelop“ vartotojams!
For most beginners and even advanced use: Daugeliui pradedančiųjų ir net patyrusių vartotojų mokymo priemonės ir pagalbos puslapis yra vertingiausi ištekliai, norint greitai sukurti puikius žaidimus.  Wiki bibliotekoje galite rašyti vadovus arba patobulinti esamus.
In a few clicks, you can create new beha: Keliais paspaudimais galite sukurti naują žaidimo objektų elgesį - naudodami įvykius ar „JavaScript“.
Flash is a custom behavior that is creat: „Flash“ - tai pasirinktinis elgesys, sukurtas tiesiogiai iš „GDevelop“ - leidžiantis objektui mirksėti
Create custom behaviors - directly from: Sukurkite pasirinktinį elgesį tiesiogiai iš „GDevelop“ redaktoriaus
GDevelop allows you to create new behavi: „GDevelop“ leidžia jums sukurti naują elgesį, naudojant tuos pačius įvykius, kuriuos naudojate kurdami savo žaidimo taisykles.
Want enemies to automatically follow the: Norite, kad priešai automatiškai sektų žaidėją?
Want some rockets to target the player?: Norite, kad kelios raketos būtų nukreiptos į žaidėją?
Want enemies and the players to have hea: Norite, kad priešai ir žaidėjai turėtų sveikatos ir padarytų žalos?
Behaviors can be created for any kind of: Elgesys gali būti sukurtas bet kokio tipo objektui, o jūs galite sukurti pasirinktinius veiksmus ir sąlygas, susijusias su jūsų nauju elgesiu.
An action is exposed by the behavior, an: Veiksmas yra veikiamas elgesio ir gali būti naudojamas kaip ir bet kuris kitas įvykių veiksmas
Import new behaviors, created by the GDe: Importuokite naują elgesį, kurį sukūrė „GDevelop“ bendruomenė
Behaviors, as well as extensions, can be: Projektai gali dalytis ir elgesiu, ir pratęsimais. Galite ** juos eksportuoti ir importuoti ** keliais paspaudimais. Jei jūsų elgesys yra įprastas ir pakartotinai naudojamas keliuose žaidimuose, galite net pateikti jį integruoti į didėjantį įprastų elgesio būdų, kuriais dalijasi bendruomenė, sąrašą.
Progressively create custom behaviors fo: Palaipsniui sukurkite pasirinktinį elgesį su žaidimo objektais
ideal for large games and keeping simple: idealiai tinka dideliems žaidimams ir paprastų renginių laikymui.
Search for new behaviors in the list of: Ieškokite naujų elgesio būdų, kuriais dalijasi bendruomenė
Download GDevelop or try it online - cre: Atsisiųskite „GDevelop“ arba išbandykite internete - kurkite žaidimus be programavimo
GDevelop is free and can be used for pro: „GDevelop“ yra nemokamas ir gali būti naudojamas pelno arba nesiekiant pelno.
GDevelop runs on Windows, macOS and most: „GDevelop“ veikia „Windows“, „macOS“ ir naujausiuose „Linux“ paskirstymuose. Taip pat galite išbandyti naudodami „Chrome“, „Firefox“ ar kitą naujausią žiniatinklio naršyklę.
This is an [AppImage](https://appimage.o: This is an [AppImage](https://appimage.org/). **Make it executable first** and run it. For example: `chmod a+x GDevelop*.AppImage && ./GDevelop*.AppImage`.
You can also [download GDevelop as a tor: You can also [download GDevelop as a torrent](https://fosstorrents.com/games/gdevelop/). Thanks to fosstorrents.com for managing these torrents.
Wonder what's new in latest versions? Fi: Įdomu, kas naujo naujausiose versijose? Raskite išleidimo pastabas programoje arba [internete] (https://github.com/4ian/GDevelop/releases).
To create your first game, start by read: To create your first game, start by reading or watching a tutorial:
GDevelop is an open-source project. You: „GDevelop“ yra atvirojo kodo projektas. Galite įsitraukti į bendruomenę, kad ją patobulintumėte!
Gdevelop 4 can still be downloaded. GDev: „Gdevelop 4“ vis dar galima atsisiųsti. „GDevelop 5“ rekomenduojama kiekvienam naujam vartotojui, nes „GDevelop 4“ nebebus atnaujinamas! Ateityje „GDevelop 4“ pagalba nebus teikiama: bet kuriam „GDevelop 4“ vartotojui rekomenduojame atnaujinti „GDevelop 5“.
GDevelop 4 is old and not supported anym: GDevelop 4 is old and not supported anymore. We recommend switching to GDevelop 5, which is compatible with most GDevelop 4 games, has many new features and an improvement user interface.
Using GDevelop in classroom is a perfect: „GDevelop“ naudojimas klasėje yra puiki proga išmokyti programavimo, žaidimų kūrimo ir išlaisvinti studentų kūrybingumą.
GDevelop has already been used in classr: „GDevelop“ jau buvo naudojamas klasėse ir internetiniuose kursuose, kartu su skaitmeninės terpės studentais ar su pirmos klasės vaikais!
Please send us your photos and tweets if: Atsiųskite mums savo nuotraukas ir tviterius, jei kursui naudojate „GDevelop“!
Install new extensions in GDevelop and s: Įdiekite naujus plėtinius „GDevelop“ ir pasidalykite jais
Install new extensions and share them: Įdiekite naujus plėtinius ir bendrinkite juos
Search and add new features to your game: Keliais paspaudimais ieškokite ir pridėkite naujų žaidimo funkcijų.
Search in the library of extensions, rea: Ieškokite plėtinių bibliotekoje, paruoštoje įdiegti vienu paspaudimu
Directly from the editor, you can explor: Tiesiogiai iš redaktoriaus galite ieškoti ** internetinėje plėtinių bibliotekoje ** (dar vadinamoje „paketų tvarkytuve“ arba „plėtinių saugykla“). Plėtiniai gali suteikti * naują elgesį * su jūsų žaidimo objektais arba * veiksmus, sąlygas * ar išraiškas, paruoštas naudoti renginiuose.
**Featured extensions** are peer reviewe: ** Panašūs plėtiniai ** yra recenzuojami. Jie yra idealūs, jei norite greitu žaidimo tempu papildyti naujas funkcijas, todėl naujų žaidimų prototipai tampa labai greitu procesu ir leidžia statyti didesnius žaidimus surenkant plėtinius.
Export your own extensions and share the: Eksportuokite savo plėtinius ir bendrinkite juos
All extensions can be exported to a file: Visus plėtinius galima eksportuoti į failą. Jie gali būti lengvai dalijami ir integruoti į kitą projektą. Geriau, jei sukūrėte naudingą plėtinį, galite pateikti jį integruotam į [atvirojo kodo, bendruomenės plėtinių] biblioteką (https://github.com/4ian/GDevelop-extensions).
As extensions are constructed using the: Kadangi plėtiniai yra kuriami naudojant intuityvius „GDevelop“ įvykių lapus, juos gali sudaryti įvykiai, [„JavaScript“ arba jų derinys] (/ „javascript-game-engine“).
Extensions can provide new behaviors tha: Plėtiniai gali suteikti naują elgesį, kurį galima pridėti prie žaidimo objektų.
Make Facebook Instant Games with GDevelo: Padarykite „Facebook“ momentinius žaidimus naudodami „GDevelop“ - paskelbkite savo žaidimus „Messenger“
With GDevelop, you can export your game: Naudodami „GDevelop“ galite eksportuoti savo žaidimą kaip „Facebook“ žaidimą per 2 paspaudimus.
First thing, make sure to have an accoun: Pirmas dalykas, įsitikinkite, kad turite sąskaitą ** „Facebook“ kūrėjams **. Sukurkite programą ir sukonfigūruokite ją kaip kategoriją „Žaidimai“ ir įgalinkite momentinius žaidimus produktuose:
In GDevelop, open your game and then the: „GDevelop“ atidarykite savo žaidimą, tada langą „Eksportuoti“. Pasirinkite ** „Facebook Instant Games“ **, spustelėkite „Export“ ir palaukite kelias sekundes.
Go back to your game page on Facebook De: Grįžkite į savo „Facebook“ kūrėjų žaidimų puslapį, meniu pasirinkite „Hostingas“ ir ** įkelkite failą **, kurį eksportavo „GDevelop“.
You can also add testers to let your fri: Taip pat galite pridėti bandytojų, kad jūsų draugai galėtų išbandyti jūsų žaidimą.
Now, get your phone and **open messenger: Dabar gaukite telefoną ir ** atidarykite Messenger **. Atidarykite pokalbį, pasirinkite Žaidimai ir spustelėkite savo žaidimo piktogramą, kad pradėtumėte prie jo žaisti!
5) Use Instant Games features and publis: 5) Naudokite momentinių žaidimų funkcijas ir paskelbkite savo žaidimą!
GDevelop gave you access to Instant Game: „GDevelop“ suteikė jums prieigą prie „Instant Games“ specifinių funkcijų, tokių kaip grotuvo vardas, kad galėtumėte geriau integruoti savo žaidimą į „Messenger“ pokalbius.
When your game is ready, submit it for r: Kai jūsų žaidimas bus paruoštas, pateikite jį peržiūrai „Facebook“, kad jis ** būtų prieinamas visame pasaulyje **!

Display [ads and reward videos](/ads-in-: Parodykite [skelbimus ir apdovanokite vaizdo įrašus] (/ skelbimus žaidime su admobu) žaidėjams naudodami [AdMob] (/ skelbimus žaidime su rodyklėmis).
Create explosions, fire and impressive e: Sukurkite sprogimus, ugnį ir įspūdingus efektus naudodami ** dalelių skleidėjus **
**Tiled sprites**, to create mosaics, fl: **Tiled sprites**, skirti sukurti mozaikas, grindis ir kartojančius raštus
Formatted rich text with **BB Text** obj: Formatted rich text with **BB Text** objects
Draw custom shapes on screen with **Shap: Pieškite pasirinktines formas ekrane naudodami **Shape Painters**
Author maps of your tile-based game in T: Author maps of your tile-based game in Tiled and import them in a **Tilemap** object
Dozens of visual effects are bundled wit: Dozens of visual effects are bundled with GDevelop
Blur, Noise, CRT effect, Color Map, Chro: Blur, Noise, CRT effect, Color Map, Chromatic Aberration, Glow, Shadows...
Add your own effects by [creating new ex: Add your own effects by [creating new extensions for the game engine](/javascript-game-engine).

Add realistic behavior to your objects: Pridėkite realų elgesį prie savo objektų

quickly make your objects draggable with: greitai padarykite savo objektus tempiamus pele / palietimu
support multiple screen sizes by ensurin: palaikykite kelis ekrano dydžius užtikrindami, kad valdikliai būtų tinkamoje padėtyje
smoothly animate object positions, sizes: sklandžiai pagyvinti objekto vietas, dydžius, nepermatomumą ir spalvas
And more, to automate current tasks and: Ir dar daugiau - keliais paspaudimais automatizuoti dabartines užduotis ir elgesį!
Dozens of additional behaviors are avail: Dozens of additional behaviors are available throught community extensions, which can be discovered and imported in one click directly from the GDevelop editor.
Make desktop & mobile-ready games: Kurkite stalinius ir mobiliesiems paruoštus žaidimus
Save player data in the browser storage: Išsaugokite žaidėjo duomenis naršyklės saugykloje arba jų įrenginiuose

a powerful pixel art and sprite editor: galingas pikselių meno ir sprinto redaktorius

When editing your game in the editor, ju: When editing your game in the editor, just press a single button to **apply your changes to the running game**.
It's a great way to tweak your game, bui: It's a great way to tweak your game, build your levels or test the gameplay without having to restart from scratch after every changes, helping you stay focused.
Preview your games **on other devices (p: Preview your games **on other devices (phone, tablets, other computers)** using the *Network Preview* - without having to export them. Useful to quickly validate the gameplay on smaller devices, verify the game performance and playtest the game with testers.

Hyperspace Dogfights, a game created wit: Hyperspace Dogfights, a game created with GDevelop
A juicy jet-combat roguelike game, made: A juicy jet-combat roguelike game, made with GDevelop.
Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-comb: „Hyperspace Dogfights“ yra reaktyvinis kovos žaidimas, kuriame jūs sprogdinsite, vengsite ir pjaustysite savo kelią per technologiškai žemesnių priešų mases. Vykdant jūsų tarpgalaktinę intervencijos misiją, jūsų adaptyvusis hiper-reaktyvinis įrenginys taps kažkuo stipresnis ir keistesnis, surinkdamas kelis šimtus žaidime esančių daiktų.
Hyperspace Dogfights began as a side pro: „Hyperspace Dogfights“ prasidėjo kaip šalutinis mūsų dabar atšauktų kosminių tyrinėjimų „Roguelike Hyperspace Admirals“ projektas. „HDog“ buvo pagamintas prototipas 2016 m. Pabaigoje, po kurio jis gavo ribotą išankstinę prieigą prie „itch.io“. Per 2017 m. Buvo sukurta didžioji jo turinio dalis ir atsižvelgiama į nuolatinį alfa grįžtamąjį ryšį. Žaidimas buvo visiškai baigtas 2018 m. Kovo mėn., Po kurio buvo pranešta apie išleidimą.
Fierce and juicy 2d jet combat against m: Fierce and juicy 2d jet combat against masses of air and ground based enemies
Hundreds of stackable passives, over fif: Hundreds of stackable passives, over fifty weapons and actives; all geared towards producing weird synergies with another
High replayability, your will evolve a l: High replayability, your will evolve a little different on each run
Seven zones with distinct enemy composit: Seven zones with distinct enemy composition to explore
5+ Player hyper-jets to fly, all coming: 5+ Player hyper-jets to fly, all coming with unlockable mk2 loadouts
16 chilled, multi-layered music tracks b: 16 chilled, multi-layered music tracks by Enuit and Ole Toensen
Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH, a game created wi: Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH, a game created with GDevelop
A retro 8-bit game, with beautiful arts: A retro 8-bit game, with beautiful arts and soundtrack, made with GDevelop.
Using GDevelop, the game was made availa: Using GDevelop, the game was made available for iOS, Android, Windows, macOS, Linux and even published as a real Arcade game.
The game was announced for BUB's 5th bir: Žaidimas buvo paskelbtas per 5-ąjį BUB gimtadienį. Kad tai taptų realybe, buvo paleistas „Kickstarter“, kuriuo gali prisidėti visi BUB draugai visame pasaulyje. „Kickstarter“ iš pradžių buvo paleistas su tikslu 100 000 USD, tačiau pasiekė 148 000 USD! GERO DARBO BUBAS.

Make your own games with GDevelop: Make your own games with GDevelop
GDevelop is an open-source, cross-platfo: GDevelop is an open-source, cross-platform game engine designed for everyone - it's extensible, fast and easy to learn.
Join the community on [Discord](https://: Join the community on [Discord](https://discord.gg/rjdYHvj) and on our [forums](https://forum.gdevelop-app.com).
Unleash your creativity with GDevelop an: Unleash your creativity with GDevelop and create any kind of game: platformers, puzzles, shoot 'em up, strategy, [8-bit games](/make-8bit-pixelart-games)... Go through the examples or start a new project from scratch.
With GDevelop, you can make simple proje: Naudodamiesi „GDevelop“ galite kurti paprastus projektus linksmybėms arba kurti ambicingus indie žaidimus, tokius kaip [„Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH]“ (/ žaidimai / „lil-bub-hello-earth“), [„Hyperspace Dogfights“ (/ žaidimai / hipers kosmoso-šunų kovos) ir [tonos iš kitų žaidimų] (/ žaidimų vitrina)!

Events: game creation, intuitive for all: Events: game creation, intuitive for all
What makes GDevelop unique and so easy t: What makes GDevelop unique and so easy to use are the events. Events are a powerful way to express the logic of your game, without having to learn a programming language.
GDevelop takes visual programming to the: GDevelop takes visual programming to the next step, allowing you to add [ready-made behaviors](/features) to your game objects and [make new behaviors](/custom-behaviors) using these intuitive, easy to learn events.
Events being used in GDevelop to create: Events being used in GDevelop to create the logic of a game
When Space is pressed, the character ani: When Space is pressed, the character animation and a sound are played. If an enemy touches the character, they both are destroyed.
Export your game anywhere, in one click: Export your game anywhere, in one click
Publish your games to the web, iOS, Andr: Paskelbkite savo žaidimus internete, „iOS“, „Android“, „Windows“, „Mac“, „Linux“ ir net [„Facebook Messenger“] (/ / „facebook-instant-games“). Žaidimai, sukurti naudojant „GDevelop“, paleidžiami bet kur ir net vienu spustelėjimu galite eksportuoti iš „Android“ į programą.
Make games for iOS, Android, Windows, ma: Make games for iOS, Android, Windows, macOS and Linux
Laptop, tablets or phone: games made wit: Laptop, tablets or phone: games made with GDevelop can run everywhere
Express your small and big ideas: you ca: Išreikškite savo mažas ir dideles idėjas: per kelias minutes galite modeliuoti naujas žaidimų savybes ir patobulinti jas be apribojimų. [Padaryti žaidimus] (/ žaidimų vitrinas) dar nebuvo taip lengva ir greita, nes [vaizdinius redaktorius] (/ žaidimų redaktorius) teikė „GDevelop“.
Want to go even further? You can extend: Want to go even further? You can extend the [game engine with Javascript](/javascript-game-engine).
See how to add a trigger button to your: See how to add a trigger button to your platformer game in 90 seconds

Using JavaScript to make your games with: Using JavaScript to make your games with GDevelop
GDevelop supports JavaScript to create y: GDevelop supports JavaScript to create your game or extend the game engine.
JavaScript can be used to write part of: JavaScript can be used to write part of a game, alongside with events
Add JavaScript code blocks inside your g: Add JavaScript code blocks inside your game
GDevelop supports adding JavaScript code: „GDevelop“ palaiko „JavaScript“ kodo blokų pridėjimą bet kurioje žaidimo įvykio vietoje. Tai geras būdas įdiegti sudėtingą algoritmą arba pakartotinai naudoti funkcijas iš atvirojo kodo bibliotekų. Įvykiai ir kodų blokai gali būti lengvai sujungiami - taigi, naudodamiesi „JavaScript“, galėsite įgyvendinti visas žaidimo dalis ar net visą žaidimą!
The JavaScript editor is based on the su: „JavaScript“ redaktorius yra pagrįstas nepaprastai galingu „Monaco Editor“, išgautu iš „Visual Studio Code“ (https://code.visualstudio.com/). Pateikiami intelektualūs automatiniai užbaigimai, o redaktorius palaiko pažangiausias funkcijas, tokias kaip kelių pasirinkimų greitesnis kodavimas.
GDevelop is modular and can be extended: „GDevelop“ yra modulinis ir gali būti išplėstas, kad atitiktų jūsų poreikius. Visų pirma, visos žaidimų funkcijos (objektai, elgesys, įvykiai) yra pagrįstos plėtinių sistema. Galite greitai sukurti naujus žaidimo plėtinius arba prisidėti prie esamų, nes „GDevelop“ yra [atvirojo kodo] (https://github.com/4ian/GD).
The Dark theme being used in GDevelop. T: The Dark theme being used in GDevelop. The code editor also comes bundled with several beautiful themes!
\n## Overview\n\nThis website (https://g:
## Overview

This website (https://gdevelop-app.com), related websites (https://forum.gdevelop-app.com, https://wiki.gdevelop-app.com, https://editor.gdevelop-app.com) and related applications (GDevelop), referred to as the Service, are operated by FLORIAN RIVAL. Throughout the site, the terms “we”, “us” and “our” refer to FLORIAN RIVAL.

This page is used to inform visitors and users regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use the Service.

If you choose to use the Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that we collect is used for providing and improving the Service. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.

The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, which is accessible at https://gdevelop-app.com/legal/terms-and-conditions unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy.

## Information Collection and Use

For a better experience, while using our Service, we may require you, for example in the case of creating an account, to provide us with certain personally identifiable information, including but not limited to your email. The information that we request will be stored in a database of the Service.

The Service does use third party services that may collect information used to identify you.

## Log Data

We want to inform you that whenever you use the Service, in a case of an error in the app we collect data and information (through third party products) on your device called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol (“IP”) address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing my Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.

These data are used to monitor the proper working on the Service and fix it in case of issues.

Link to privacy policy of some third party service providers used by the website and applications for Log Data:

- Sentry: https://sentry.io/privacy/

## Analytics Data

We want to inform you that whenever you use the Service, at various points in the app we collect data and information (through third party products) on your device called Analytics Data. This Analytics Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol (“IP”) address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing my Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.

These data are aggregated and used to understand how people use the Service and improve it.

Link to privacy policy of some third party service providers used by the website and applications for Analytics:

- Keen.io: https://keen.io/privacy-policy/
- Google Analytics: https://policies.google.com/privacy

## Cookies

Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are commonly used as anonymous unique identifiers. These are sent to your browser from the websites that you visit and are stored on your device's internal memory.
This Service stores a “cookie” when you create or log in to an account. However, the app may use third party code and libraries that use “cookies” to collect information and improve their services. You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies and know when a cookie is being sent to your device. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of this Service.

## Service Providers

We may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons:

- To facilitate our Service;
- To provide the Service on our behalf;
- To perform Service-related services; or
- To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.

We want to inform users of this Service that these third parties can have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.

Link to privacy policy of some third party service providers used by the website and applications:

- Google Play Services: https://policies.google.com/privacy
- Firebase: https://firebase.google.com/support/privacy
- Amazon Web Services: https://aws.amazon.com/privacy/

## Security

We value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

## Links to Other Sites

This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by us. Therefore, we strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.

## Your Rights and Choices in the EEA and Around the World

Where the EU General Data Protection Regulation 2016/679 (“GDPR”) applies to the processing of your personal data, especially when you access the website from a country in the European Economic Area (“EEA”), you have the following rights, subject to some limitations, against us:

* The right to access your personal data;
* The right to rectify the personal data we hold about you;
* The right to erase your personal data;
* The right to restrict our use of your personal data;
* The right to object to our use of your personal data;
* The right to receive your personal data in a usable electronic format and transmit it to a third party (also known as the right of data portability); and
* The right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority.

If you would like to exercise any of these rights, you may do so by mailing contact.gdevapp@gmail.com. Please understand, however, the rights enumerated above are not absolute in all cases.

Where the GDPR applies, you also have the right to withdraw any consent you have given to uses of your personal data. If you wish to withdraw consent that you have previously provided to us, you may do so by mailing contact.gdevapp@gmail.com. However, the withdrawal of consent will not affect the lawfulness of processing based on consent before its withdrawal.

We will undertake best efforts to provide these rights to people outside of the EEA as well.

## Children’s Privacy

These Services do not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. In the case we discover that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, We immediately delete this from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so that we will be able to do necessary actions.

## Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately after they are posted on this page.

## Contact Us

If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us at [gdevelop-app-support@googlegroups.com](gdevelop-app-support@googlegroups.com).

## Attribution and License

This Privacy Policy is licensed under Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-SA 4.0). It is a derivative work of:

* [Red Hat’s Privacy Policy for the Fedora Project](https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Legal:PrivacyPolicy), used under CC Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported
* [The Free Software Foundation’s Privacy Policy](https://www.fsf.org/about/free-software-foundation-privacy-policy), used under Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-SA 4.0)
* [WordPress.org’s Privacy Policy](https://wordpress.org/about/privacy/), used under Attribution-ShareAlike 2.5 Generic (CC BY-SA 2.5)
Super fast game development with Live Pr: Super fast game development with Live Preview (Hot reload) and Network Preview (Preview over Wifi/LAN)
Live Preview and Preview over Wifi/LAN: Live Preview and Preview over Wifi/LAN
Achieve super fast game development with: Achieve super fast game development with Live Preview and previews on your external devices.
Live Preview: get your changes applied t: Live Preview: get your changes applied to your game while playing it
Live Preview, also called *hot reloading: Live Preview, also called *hot reloading*, is applying your changes to your game preview, without having to restart it. Design your level, change some events, add new objects, modify visual effects, then click on a button and the game preview will be updated automatically.
To start using Live Preview, just launch: To start using Live Preview, just launch a preview as usual. When the preview is running, go back to the editor, do some changes and press the Preview button again. That's it!
Network Preview: preview your game insta: Network Preview: preview your game instantly on other devices
Live Preview also works with the *Networ: Live Preview also works with the *Network Preview*. With the Network Preview, also called *Preview over WiFi/LAN*, you can try your game on your phone, tablet or even on other computer browsers - without having to export them. It's useful to quickly validate the gameplay on smaller devices, verify the game performance and try the game.
Learn how to run previews in GDevelop: Learn how to run previews in GDevelop
Make your own 8-bit and pixelart games: Make your own 8-bit and pixelart games
Sprite editor and tools to make your own: Sprite editor and tools to make your own 8bit games with GDevelop
See Piskel sprite editor being used insi: See Piskel sprite editor being used inside GDevelop to make a 8bit game
GDevelop is bundled with [Piskel](https:: „GDevelop“ yra kartu su „Piskel“ (https://www.piskelapp.com/), galingu ir lengvai naudojamu 2D „sprite“ redaktoriumi. Tai puikus įrankis kurti vaizdo elementų taškus, kad suteiktų retro įspūdį jūsų žaidimui! Galite kurti objektus su keliomis animacijomis, bet kuriuo metu redaguoti spritus ir pamatyti rezultatą paleidę savo žaidimo apžvalgą.

[Poki.com](https://poki.com/) is a curat: [Poki.com](https://poki.com/) is a curated discovery platform for free, high-quality online games. Reach hundred of millions of players around the globe and get a lifetime revenue share from advertising when your game is played.
Export your game as an HTML5 game: Export your game as an HTML5 game
From GDevelop, choose to [export your ga: From GDevelop, choose to [export your game as HTML5](http://wiki.compilgames.net/doku.php/gdevelop5/publishing/html5_game_in_a_local_folder). The result is a web game, running with WebGL, that can be played on any recent desktop and mobile browser.
In GDevelop, open your game and then the: In GDevelop, open your game and then the Export window. Choose **Local folder**, click on Export and wait a few seconds to get your game ready.
On the developer page of Poki.com, get i: On the developer page of Poki.com, get in touch with Poki team or directly submit your game. Use [GDevelop JavaScript features](/javascript-game-engine) to integrate their lightweight SDK. When your game is published on Poki, get real-time insights into how your game is doing and support from their tech team.
There either has been an error or you ca: There either has been an error or you cancelled the subscription. If you want to get a subscription to support GDevelop and unlock online services, try again to choose one from GDevelop (*My Profile* menu).
As an open-source software, GDevelop req: „GDevelop“, kaip atvirojo kodo programinė įranga, reikalauja laiko ir pinigų, kad būtų sukurtas ir tvarus. Ačiū už jūsų indėlį! Jei norite labiau įsitraukti, taip pat galite [perskaityti visus būdus] (/ prisidėti) prisidėti prie „GDevelop“ ekosistemos.
